content: of round round 6 k all sts round 7 * yo k3 pyo3k k3 repeat from * to end of round round 8 k all sts round 9 same as round 5 round 10 k all sts round 11 same as round 3 round 12 k all sts set-up for heel flap now put the next 30 36 42 sts on hold they will be worked later for instep the heel is worked over the 30 36 42 sts you have still on the needles hold your sock so ws is facing you and start working the heel flap ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved moldau v 1 page 2/5 moldau socks - by caoua coffee heel flap ws row 1 * sl yf p1 repeat from * to end turn rs row 2 k all sts turn ws row 3 sl yf p2 * sl yf p1 repeat from * to 1 st before end p1 turn rs row 4 * k2 yo k3 pyo3k k1 repeat from * to end turn ws row 5 same as row 1 rs row 6 k all sts turn ws row 7 same as row 3 rs row 8 * k1 yo k3 pyo3k k2 repeat from * to end turn ws row 9 same as row 1 rs row 10 k all sts turn ws row 11 same as row 3 rs row 12 * yo k3 pyo3k k3 repeat from * to end turn ws row 13 same as row 1 rs row 14 k all sts turn ws row 15 same as row 3 rs row 16 same as row 8 ws row 17 same as row 1 rs row 18 k all sts turn ws row 19 same as row 3 rs row 20 same as row 4 ws row 21 same as row 1 rs row 22 k all sts turn ws row 23 same as row 3 rs row 24 * k3 yo k3 pyo3k repeat from * to end turn then restart from row 1 and continue to work heel flap row until you have worked 30 36 42 row total turn heel ws sl yf p16 20 22 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k5 7 5 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat these last 2 row until all sts have been worked don t turn after last rs row now 18 22 24 heel sts remain gusset setup pick up and knit 16 19 22 sts along side of heel flap pick up and knit 1 more st between flap and instep knit the 30 36 42 held instep sts then pick up 1 st between instep and heel flap knit it pick up and knit 16 19 22 sts along heel flap and then knit the remaining 35 42 47 sole sts now
